恗字的基本解释

恗
hū
胆怯。
忧伤。

恗
kuā
心自大。

恗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hū］
［《廣韻》荒烏切，平模，曉。］
(1)恐惧怯懦。
(2)忧虑伤心。
[②]［kuā］
［《集韻》枯瓜切，平麻，溪。］
妄自尊大。

恗字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　恗； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页384第21
【廣韻】荒烏切【集韻】荒胡切，?音呼。【博雅】怯也。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?空胡切，音枯。義同。　又【集韻】枯瓜切，音誇。心自大也。　又【五音集韻】苦瓦切，音夸。心悷也。

恗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
恗字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hū］
["Guangyun" Wild Wu cut, flat model, Xiao. ]
(1) Fear and cowardice.
(2) Anxiety and sadness.
[②]［kuā］
["Jiyun" withered melon cut, flat hemp, stream. ]
Arrogant.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　恗; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 384 21
[Guang Yun] Wild Wu cut [Ji Yun] Wild Hu cut,? Sound call. [Bo Ya] Yeah.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? Empty Hu cut, sound is dry. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Cut the dried melon, the sound is exaggerated. Arrogant too.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Kuwaqie, the sound is exaggerated. Heartbroken too.
